concept.title: REST Response
concept.shortdesc: You can view REST response JSON data for different aspects of the , such as pipeline configuration information or monitoring details.

conbody.p: REST responsesoverviewYou can use the REST response information to provide details to a REST-based monitoring system. Or you might use the information in conjunction with the REST API.

You can access the following REST response data:
Pipeline Configuration - Provides information about the pipeline and each stage in the pipeline.
Pipeline Rules - Provides information about metric and data rules and alerts.
Definitions - Provides information about all available stages.
Preview Data- Provides information about the preview data moving through the pipeline. Also includes monitoring information that is not used in preview.
Pipeline Monitoring - Provides monitoring information for the pipeline.
Pipeline Status - Provides the current status of the pipeline.
JVM Metrics - Provides JVM metrics for the .
Thread Dump - Lists all active Java threads used by the .
